first_para: Adrian Edward Bailey (born 11 December 1945) is a British Labour Co-operative politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for West Bromwich West since winning the seat at a by-election in 2000. He is also the Chairman of the Business, Innovation and Skills Committee.

full.extract: Adrian Edward Bailey (born 11 December 1945) is a British Labour Co-operative politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for West Bromwich West since winning the seat at a by-election in 2000. He is also the Chairman of the Business, Innovation and Skills Committee.
full.title: Adrian Bailey
